posts.post_content:
Turn 4: Play [Goblin Charbelcher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Charbelcher)   
Turn 5: Play the Recruiter, put about 20 goblins on top of your deck, then activate your Charbelcher.
  
Rest of game: Laugh Maniacally

You're not very creative are you?
